Package com.platform.subscription.api

package com.platform.subscription.api
  • Class
    Description
    PlanController
     
    PlanDto
    Data transfer objects for plan-related operations.
    PlanDto.BillingInterval
    Billing interval enumeration for API layer.
    PlanDto.CreatePlanRequest
    Request DTO for creating a new plan.
    PlanDto.PlanResponse
    Response DTO for plan information.
    PlanDto.UpdatePlanRequest
    Request DTO for updating an existing plan.
    PlanManagementService
    Service interface for plan management operations.
    PlanManagementServiceImpl
    Implementation of PlanManagementService that bridges the API and internal layers.
    SubscriptionController
     
    SubscriptionDto
    Data transfer objects for subscription-related operations.
    SubscriptionDto.CancelSubscriptionRequest
    Request DTO for canceling subscription.
    SubscriptionDto.ChangePlanRequest
    Request DTO for changing subscription plan.
    SubscriptionDto.CreateSubscriptionRequest
    Request DTO for creating a subscription.
    SubscriptionDto.InvoiceResponse
    Response DTO for invoice information.
    SubscriptionDto.InvoiceStatus
    Invoice status enumeration for API layer.
    SubscriptionDto.ReactivateSubscriptionRequest
    Request DTO for reactivating subscription.
    SubscriptionDto.SubscriptionResponse
    Response DTO for subscription information.
    SubscriptionDto.SubscriptionStatisticsResponse
    Response DTO for subscription statistics.
    SubscriptionDto.SubscriptionStatus
    Subscription status enumeration for API layer.
    SubscriptionManagementService
    Service interface for subscription management operations.
    SubscriptionManagementServiceImpl
    Implementation of SubscriptionManagementService that bridges the API and internal layers.

    Test-only subscription endpoints to satisfy integration tests.
